name: Spark (itch) (kenpo)
description:
I developed this game to test unity 2019. but my nieces ended up liking it and decided to post it in the store. I'm probably going to update it with new invoices I want to try, like the google play online score and the login system with facebook and google.

Download link: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.kenpo.Spark

Sound effects obtained from https://www.zapsplat.com
